summary: The ego vehicle is driving on a road with other vehicles present. A man on a scooter suddenly appears from the side of the road, creating a potential hazard.
actions: Ego vehicle is driving straight. Other vehicles are moving in the same direction. A man on a scooter is attempting to cross the road.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, other vehicles, scooter, crosswalk.
next_action: Ego vehicle will continue driving straight, potentially needing to brake or swerve to avoid the scooter.
